name: Applied Life Private
description: Developer of a women's community platform designed to offer support, resources, opportunities, and interactions, discuss health, career, relationships, get work-from-home jobs, and more. The company's platform offers a diverse range of engagement formats to women, including corporate jobs, returning professionals programs, partner programs, part-time work, freelancing, and franchising, enabling women to find mentorship and career content while also helping them with personal advice via growth channels of community, content, champions, conversations, commerce, and companies.
